<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Winning Streak](/Spells.aspx?ID=1034)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Marishi](/Deities.aspx?ID=265), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 20 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round (see text)
</row>

</column>

---

The target is energized by its good fortune as it spreads to others—as long as they keep winning. It gains the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition for 1 round. If the target or one of their allies within 20 feet gets a critical success on an attack roll against a significant foe, whoever got the critical success becomes quickened if they weren't already, and the duration of the _winning streak_ is extended by another round. Creatures quickened by the spell can use the extra action to Strike, Step, or Stride. If a full round passes without the target or one their allies critically succeeding on an attack roll against a significant foe, the _winning streak_ breaks and the spell ends.
name: Winning Streak
